00002 
00003 process = cms.Process("ContentTester")
00004 
00005 process.maxEvents = cms.untracked.PSet( input = cms.untracked.int32(4) )
00006 
00007 process.source = cms.Source("NewEventStreamFileReader",
00008                             fileNames = cms.untracked.vstring('file:../db/closed/kab.812191607.0007.A.storageManager.00.0000.dat')
00009                             )
